amendment.description: Amendment requires the State Department to report to Congress concerning nongovernmental organizations receiving funding under the President's Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21A made in order pursuant to section 2 of H. Res. 365, as passed by the House, to add a new section providing funding for nongovernmental organizations under the President's emergency plan for aids relief.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
